mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no as post_no , p.user_id as user_id , u.nickname as nickname , u.profile_picture_url as profileImg , p.content as contetnt , f.no as file_no , f.file_name as file_name , f.file_path as file_path , f.file_code as file_code , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from `like` l where l.post_no = p.post_no),0) as likeCount , IFNULL((SELECT count(*) from wishlist w where w.parent_no = p.post_no and w.parent_table = 'post'),0) as wishCount FROM post p INNER JOIN file f on post_no = parent_no and f.parent_table='post' and file_code = 1 INNER JOIN user u on p.user_id = u.user_id
